Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1248.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Babel Tower, 38th Floor'}
{3: 'Babel Tower, 38th Floor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'How are you holding up?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The four of you walk along the curved staircase, steadily making your way upward.'}
{2: "Don't worry. The power armor's got me covered.", 3: '17'}
{3: 'You wave a hand, causing slight mechanical clinks from within the power armor, signaling that everything is fine.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'Which floor are we headed to next?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: "Feels like we're close to the top now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1241.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1241.jpg'}
{3: 'The group pushes open the door to the 38th floor while chatting casually.'}

{3: 'Inside the circular chamber, tangled cables and computer terminals fill the space. At its heart, a cylindrical device stands as crimson crystals formed from the Punishing Virus creep outward, while data is still displayed on some of the screens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: "Nothing like what we've seen. What do you think, 【kuroname】?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Which is expected.', 3: '43'}

{3: "Based on intel you gathered, Thomas was conducting space-time research, which would require a dedicated facility. The Mirror Demon isn't likely to change its lair, so this tower was most likely constructed by modifying the original laboratory."}
{2: 'This is where Thomas conducted his experiments.', 3: '46'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vergil', 3: 'Where everything started.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I need to back up Thomas' data while we're here.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'It will help you return to your world.', 3: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'Then we wait for you to finish the backup.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "The Mirror Demon won't just stand by and watch while we gather information.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dante', 3: "Hmm... which means someone's gotta scout ahead.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Vergil turns to open a large door, heading up without a backward glance. Not one to be left behind, Dante strides after him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: "Well, looks like we're up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the two half-demons disappear into the shadows, only you and Alpha remain in the eerie laboratory.'}
{2: "Aren't you going up with them?", 3: '67'}
{3: 'You lean forward to insert the storage device into the lab computer, asking in a hushed voice.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I promised Lucia I'd take care of you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After these words, silence fills the room.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1245.jpg'}
{3: 'The Sons of Sparda soon reach the next floor.'}
{3: 'This floor lacks the familiar ring of doors. Instead, it opens into a vast, domed chamber with a single passage leading upward.'}
{3: 'At the heart of the space stands a Hetero-Creature. Its presence radiates menace, more powerful than any they have encountered before.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vergil', 3: 'Things are getting interesting.', 4: '1'}
